title: Contrato n22
body: Sector: X11.  Objective: Investigate the sewers and report only to me.  Reward: 22 MCr.

title: are you kidding me?
body: Your overuse of D-Class is way out of line. Bring it down to reasonable levels or you'll be force-fed amnestics and demoted to 173 duty.
